Articles.Content:
i decided to try and build one of these again (yes i've tried before), now that we have the new editor tools in the game it actually turned out really well in my opinion, it flies like a brick, but at least it got off the ground with all those monstrous aerodynamic properties

 

please excuse my constant camera movements, that was my ocd deciding if it looked good from all angles
Looks really cool! The blockiness makes it look unique in my opinion, like a true war machine!
